duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain all kitchen cooking and service standards
Grow knowledge of all food and beverage offerings
Assist with product check-in and rotation to ensure all recipes and orders are executed accurately and timely
Uphold the highest standards of cleanliness and sanitation
Assume responsibility for an entire station and all ingredient prep for that station
Participate in teamwork and foster a harmonious working climate
Embrace change and deliver top results no matter the obstacle

education_certification.credential: Food Safety Certification specific to State Laws
